attributes.action: sack his cabinet to win election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we can all see that gordon brown knows what he is talking about,and has done a good deal for our country.
i feel that it is the people around mr brown that is going to lose him the election, therefor get rid of the old faces. and bring back new labour with a fresh gordon brown at the helm.
